column4: Check Wine AppDB (google it) to see if an app works in Wine. I checked InDesign CS4 the other day and apparently it's garbage.
Ya, I was just trying to see if anyone had managed a successful install of CS4 since the wineappdb only mentioned getting the installer to work and nothing about the actual program
if the appds doesn't give you enough info try it out and write about your own experience there :)
